content: Investments Trading Maybank Kim Eng Asked by AnonymousAsked on 11 May 2019Is Maybank Kim Eng the cheapest for monthly investment plan via pre funded account?Saw that they have a list of blue chips, US, HK stocks and as little as $1 commission.Currently they have $0 commission to end June.1 answerAnswerBump0

Tan Wei MingLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 11 May 2019Depending on how much you are investing every month. If it is less than $500 then POSB InvestSaver and Maybank KE MIP are cheaper since their commission is min $1.0 comments0
